snippet: The show celebrated the Notorious B.I.G., who would have turned 44 on Saturday. “The greatest rapper of all time isn’t here to celebrate with us,” Mr. Combs said before the concert closed with “I’ll Be Missing You.”
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews kickoff concert for Bad Boy Family Reunion tour, headed by Sean Combs as tribute to deceased rapper Notorious B I G, at Barclays Center.
lead_paragraph: The show celebrated the Notorious B.I.G., who would have turned 44 on Saturday. “The greatest rapper of all time isn’t here to celebrate with us,” Mr. Combs said before the concert closed with “I’ll Be Missing You.”

headline.main: Review: Sean Combs Leads a Bad Boy Reunion, With a Surprising Amount of Soul
headline.print_headline: A Wistful and Riotous Ramble Through a Label’s Early Days
